text:
PathSense | San Diego | OnSite | Software Engineer & Machine Learning Scientist

PathSense is building a better location stack for iOS and Android - better-than-GPS accuracy with 90% less battery drain.

We're funded by Data Collective and other prominent investors, have traction with many of the major location apps, and have an all-star team and advisers.

Check out our openings here -> https://pathsense.com/careers/
